property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around lists.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for lists.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for lists.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for lists.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for lists.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the list should have a border.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for list items.

property.name: background-position
property.description: Background image position for list items.

property.name: background-repeat
property.description: Background image repetition for list items.

state.name: unfocused
state.description: Applies to items on unfocused lists.

state.name: even
state.description: Applies to items with an even index.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over the list item.
